Articles.Content:
This might sound stupid but where do I download the latest version. I bought it directly from KSP and cant find where to Download the latest version 1.2 atm.

I;m on v1.04.

Go to kerbalspaceprogram.com

Click the "Store" link.

Log in with your email and password.

Click "My Account"

Click the "Download" button

Choose the appropriate version to download
Thanks ... I just worked it out while your reply came in...hope this helps some one else one day.
